includedAssets.title: The Empty Hearse
includedAssets.synopsis: Two years after Sherlock's 'death', Dr John Watson has got on with his life. But, with London under threat of a devastating terrorist attack, Sherlock is about to stage his outrageous resurrection. But if he thinks everything will be just as he left it, he's in for a very big surprise...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With London under threat of a devastating terrorist attack, Sherlock prepares to stage his outrageous resurrection.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Two years after Sherlock's 'death', Dr John Watson has got on with his life. But, with London under threat of a devastating terrorist attack, Sherlock is about to stage his outrageous resurrection. But if he thinks everything will be just as he left it, he's in for a very big surprise...

includedAssets.title: The Sign Of Three
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep2 - The Sign Of Three
includedAssets.synopsis: Sherlock faces his biggest challenge of all - delivering a best man's speech on John's wedding day. But all isn't quite as it seems. Mortal danger stalks the reception - and someone might not make it to the happy couple's first dance. Sherlock must thank the bridesmaids, solve the case and stop a killer.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sherlock faces his biggest challenge yet - delivering a best man's speech at John's wedding.

includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, violence

includedAssets.title: His Last Vow
includedAssets.synopsis: A case of stolen letters leads Sherlock Holmes into a long conflict with Charles Augustus Magnussen, the Napoleon of blackmail, and the one man he truly hates. But how do you tackle a foe who knows the personal weakness of every person of importance in the Western world?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A case of stolen letters leads Sherlock into conflict with Charles Augustus Magnussen, the Napoleon of blackmail.

But how do you tackle a foe who knows the personal weakness of every person of importance in the Western world?

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: With London under threat, Sherlock prepares for his grand re-entrance, while John attempts to move on with his life. Benedict Cumberbatch and Martin Freeman star in this third series of the global hit.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sherlock prepares for his grand re-entrance, while John attempts to move on. Benedict Cumberbatch and Martin Freeman star in this third series.

includedIn.title: Sherlock
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A chance encounter brings Afghanistan veteran John Watson into the unique world of genius sleuth Sherlock Holmes.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: A chance encounter brings Afghanistan veteran John Watson into the unique world of genius sleuth Sherlock Holmes.
